hero.title: Career Opportunities
hero.subtitle: Join our team and build a rewarding career

advisor.title: Financial Advisor
advisor.summary: Join our team as a Financial Advisor and help clients achieve their financial goals.
advisor.responsibilities: Provide financial planning and insurance solutions to clients, Build and maintain client relationships, Meet sales targets and performance metrics, Stay current with industry trends and regulations
advisor.requirements: Bachelor's degree preferred, Strong communication and interpersonal skills, Self-motivated with entrepreneurial mindset, Willingness to obtain required licenses
advisor.benefits: Competitive commission structure, Comprehensive training program, Marketing and administrative support, Career advancement opportunities

senior.title: Senior Financial Consultant
senior.summary: Experienced professionals wanted to join our elite team of senior consultants.
senior.responsibilities: Manage high-net-worth client portfolios, Develop sophisticated financial strategies, Mentor junior advisors, Represent UAN District at industry events
senior.requirements: Minimum 3 years in financial services, Proven track record of success, MDRT qualification preferred, Strong leadership abilities
senior.benefits: Premium commission rates, Leadership development opportunities, International conference attendance, Executive support team

manager.title: Unit Manager
manager.summary: Lead and develop a team of financial advisors while growing your own business.
manager.responsibilities: Recruit and develop team members, Provide coaching and mentorship, Drive team performance and culture, Strategic business planning
manager.requirements: 5+ years industry experience, Demonstrated leadership success, Strong business acumen, MDRT or COT qualifier
manager.benefits: Override commissions, Management bonuses, Leadership training, Strategic planning support
